document_data.name: Umbrenne
document_data.mainbody:
'''Umbrenne''' was a [[Talonite]] preacher from the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Listen and submit to the Mistress of Disease! The cycle comes for us all!''|Umbrenne}}
document_data.Description: Umbrenne was a midle-aged in appearance [[wood elf]] with sickly green skin, long straight graying hair, and brown eyes. He was dressed in simple burlap [[priest]]ly [[robe]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Umbrenne could be found preaching to commoners and refugees in the Lower City of Baldur's Gate, not far from the [[Basilisk Gate]]. He spent his days evangelizing over the cycle of life and death through pestilence as taught by the Mother of all Plagues.
